ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BpeI2:ref","RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #411944 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BpeI2:ref - Formatting USB Stick via Rufus failes    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BpeI2:ref ]","anatoli.lorenz@partner.bmw.de","Lorenz Anatoli,","techsupport@netwrix.com","","","false","2024-06-14T07:00:44.000Z","true"

When Rufus formats the drive it creates a volume. That volume is not visible in Windows Explorer as it does not have a ""drive letter"", but is detected by our device control driver and is blocked. It is blocked because the ""Unknown Device"" category is blocked. Following this the Rufus app to fails as it needs to access the blocked volume.
The options would be to allow Unknown Device while you are using Rufus, or use the OTP option to allow it for a limited time.

If the blocking is done by the EPP Agent, why is no User Remediation displayed?
I also could not find a report entry for ""Unknown Device"". Do ""Unknown Devices"" not generate any entries?
If something is blocked by the EPP Agent, I expect that the user can unlock it or that the blocking is visible/reported.
